name: Tappy Earth Planter
description:
Tappy Earth Planter is a beautiful game which, as the name suggests, is all about planting little trees all over our lovely planet earth.

The game itself is very simple in terms of gameplay and controls. All you have to do is tap on the bottom of the screen to plant a tree on the planet revolving in front of it.

Gold of the game is to plant trees on the empty spaces on the planet. If you plant on an un-emptied space then its a game over.

The game presents you with more than hundred levels so that you can have a great time playing it.
The graphics of the game are extremely beautiful and soothing.

The game is also a way to promote plantation on our planet so that we can fight the global warming and other disasters that occur because of the lack of trees.

So enjoy the game and pass on the message.
